page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ZARA
page.content: Hello.My name is Zara Fletcher and I am 9 years old.Each morning I awake at 7am, wash and have breakfast.My mum drives me to the end of the lane where I pick up the school coach. The coach arrives at school at about 8.30. School begins at 8.45. We normally begin the day with reading to ourselves whilst the teacher hears the children read. Later we have assembly and afterwards begin the day in earnest.Normally we do such things as English and Maths during the morning and spend the afternoons doing practical subjects such as Science,Needlework,Art,Craft,Games and music. I like school very much and am always sad when the school holidays arrive as I have no friends to play with at home. Sometimes we are given homework to do. I enjoy homework. Most evenings I go swimming with my mother.
